item.description:
It's our second anniversary and we'll be in a new location, so we have much to celebrate.

We'll be starting and running later than usual -- starting at 12:30 and going to about 6:30 p.m. We'd like to include the following elements:

FOOD! Bring anything you want to share -- snacks, main dishes, beverages, desserts. There's a full kitchen with a microwave, fridge, etc. Sign up on the Message Board, but really, anything goes.

SWAPS! If participating in this month's themed swaps, bring your 6 finished cards and drop them off at the registration table as you arrive.

YARD SALE!Got stuff you want to sell, trade, give away? Here's your chance. See the Message Board for details.

GROUP ACTIVITY: We'll be doing the Found Poetry Challenge, an easy activity combining words and images. All materials and instructions will be provided.

And lots more! See the Message Board for details.
item.how_to_find_us: Khaki apron; name tag that says "Anne"

group.name: New England Artist Trading Cards Plus (ATCs+) Meetup Group

item.name: May 2009 NE ATCs+ Meetup--Now on Sat. May 16 in Needham
